Two (2) 'A' level passes 
in relevant subjects.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes  
to include English 
Language.  
  
Any three (3) Arts 
and Social Science 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) AJAYI requires two (2) 'A' level passes or their 
equivalent in LiteratureinEnglish and one (1) 
other Arts or Social Science subject, plus three (3) 
'O' level credit  passes.  
(ii) BENIN accepts  
a) ND Mass Communication upper credit or its 
equivalent.    
b) 'A' level or HSC with passes in Literature in 
English, History and CRS or any other Arts or 
Social Science subjects.    
c) NCEcredit in Theatre Arts or relevant 
subject.  
(iii) BINGHAM accepts ND upper credit  in Public 
Administration and other related programmes.  It 
also requires two (2) ‘A' level passes to include 
Government or History.  
(iv) For UNN, candidates must posses HSC/GCE 'A' 
level with passes in two (2) Arts subjects plus the 
UTME requirements.  
(v) JOS accepts same in Mass Communication plus 
'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
  
  
  
UTME  
(i) AJAYI requiresfive (5) 'O' level credit passesto 
include English Language, Literature in English 
and three other subjects from Arts or Social 
Sciences.  
(ii) BENIN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes or 
TC II or equivalent qualification at not more than
